headline: Jim Cramer on GE Aerospace: “Self-Improvement Here Is Extraordinary”
summary: GE Aerospace (NYSE:GE) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared his take on. Cramer called the company’s CEO the “savior of the old GE,” as he said: How about GE Aerospace? headline: GE Aerospace Backlog Nears $190 Billion As Airlines Spend Big On Engine Upkeep
summary: GE Aerospace (NYSE:GE) on Thursday reported strong fourth-quarter 2025 results, reflecting continued momentum across its businesses. It posted total revenue (GAAP) of $12.717 billion, up 18% year over year. Sales of $12.717 billion beat the $11.177 billion estimate, and adjusted EPS of $1.57 beat the $1.43 estimate. Continuing EPS (GAAP) was $2.31, up 32%, and adjusted EPS was $1.57, up 19%. Cash from operating activities was $2.096 billion, up 59%, and free cash flow was $1.760 billion, up 15%.
